paragraphs.text: We are a composite team of friends, with completely different backgrounds and from several countries. But we all love cycling, especially in Italy, appreciating its tasty composite and vast culture and its food.

The idea of creating a unique bike tour to give our guests an unforgettable experience with us has been in the air for years now, but between Covid, travel restrictions, and organisational requirements it took a bit longer than originally hoped.
At long last it can now come to reality!
We strongly believe that our different experiences in work and life will be our biggest strength and will allow us to offer you the best trip youâ€™ve ever had!
images: Wherever you go becomes a part of you somehow.jpeg
